properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA out 10 nm; Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Watch issued February 7 at 8:57AM PST until February 9 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very steep and hazardous seas 14 to 19 feet possible.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino out 10 nm, Cape
Mendocino to Pt Arena out 10 nm and Pt St George to Cape
Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...From late Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or cause
damage to vessels.
properties.instruction:
Consider altering your plans to avoid possible hazardous sea
conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
